ygData.messageBody:
I think you have a misconception here...
1)Bolt spells needs longer than Shock spells to cast, unless you specialize
in Evocation and maxed it then it is a different story. If not, Bolt
generally needs longer than Shock.
2)Necro's pets are bugged now, if you give them a weapon, they will take the
speed of the weapon and the base damage of the MOB of their level. That
means that if you give it a weapon with 13 delay at level 49 it will hit
with 13 delay and for about 50-60 a pop. That is why they toned down both
the Mage and Necro pet the previous patch. But from what I can see from the
screams and flames in a msg. board, I think Necro's pet still no change,
only lower damage. They still take the speed of the weapon you give it.
3)Mages nuke never draw the MOB to us because for level 29 to 33 and level
39 to 44 Wizards can do almost twice the damage a Mage can. This is because
Mages gets a new DD or Bolt spell every 10 levels. That is why MOBs seems to
be attracted to Wizards like ants to sugar.
4)Our buffs are 'store buffs'... I hate to burst you bubble, but the only
thing Mages have worth summoning that is useful to a group is RingofFlight.
Our other 'store buffs'/weapon summoning spell also useful, if everyone dies
and need to get their body back from the middle of a dungeon. Even then, the
weapon's stats is pathetic for their level. Imagine using a
BarbedLeatherWhip at level 38 to fight without any armor.
5)Pets tank for you while you flee. No arguement, my Mage have saved my
party numerous time by making my pet to tank the stupid GreaterDarkBone that
drops through the ceiling in the Unrest Bartender room.
